name: INPaymentAmountResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for the amount to pay for a bill.

items.name: class func success(with: INPaymentAmount) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INPaymentAmount?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user confirm the value before proceeding.

items.name: class func disambiguation(with: [INPaymentAmount]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
